title: Is there an issue with Ornn missions
body: Played a game with Ornn yet my missions didnt update at all, is there something wrong

replies.body: It does look like we've been having a couple issues with the Ornn missions currently, but the devs are aware and still working on ironing things out. We'll be sure to update the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) when it's fixed!
